column4: Tourism;Koh Rong: A body has been found near Koh Kong (*EDIT: the distance and location keep changing
column5: co-ordinates have been given as N10 ° 47.691 – E102 ° 26.645)
column6: but reported as between 50-90 km from Koh Rong
column7: depending on the many sources.------Images show that this is missing British woman Amelia Bambridge.------Authorities are now investigating the cause of death
column8: and the body is being taken to Sihanoukville. Updates to follow.
